text: 1. Add a Multi-select widget and enter some Options for it in the Property pane. 2. Set the onOptionChange action of the Multi-select widget to store the selected options to Appsmith store. 3. Add a Button widget that will dynamically add a value to the selected options of the Multi-Select widget and will return an error message if that value is already selected. To achieve this, in the onClick event of the button, store the desired option value to an Appsmith store array if it is not included yet and use the showAlert() method to display the error message if it is. 4. Add a Button widget that will clear all values from the Multi-Select widget. To achieve this, in the onClick event of the button, clear the array from Appsmith store, by saving it as undefined. 5. Set the Default Value of the Multi-select widget to use the Appsmith store array value.
